message:
Team “Regressor” Shivam Agarwal and Kanav Anand from IIT Kharagpur has made it into the top 30 finalists of International Data Analytics Olympiad 2018. They are representing India in the final round at Moscow and will be competing against teams from 8 different countries. 
We congratulate and wish best of luck to the team Regressor on behalf of KDAG.

Hello KGP. Here is a beginner's guide to the field of Machine Learning and Data Analytics.

Here are few of the resources for learning and implementations :
1. Machine Learning by Andrew Ng - https://www.coursera.org/learn/machine-learning
2. The Analytics Edge - edX - https://www.edx.org/course/analytics-edge-mitx-15-071x-3
3. Python for Machine Learning - Udemy - https://www.udemy.com/data-science-and-machine-learning-with-python-hands-on/ (Can see preview for free)
4. Deep Learning - https://www.coursera.org/specializations/deep-learning
5. An introduction to statistical learning in R-ISLR - https://github.com/tpn/pdfs/blob/master/An%20Introduction%20To%20Statistical%20Learning%20with%20Applications%20in%20R%20(ISLR%20Sixth%20Printing).pdf
6. Machine learning by Yaser Abu Mostafa cs-156 - A little math intensive.

P.S: 2nd & 3rd year UG students interested to join KDAG for this academic year can solve the following problem statement and send their report in Ipython Notebook/R Markdown to iitkdag@gmail.com by 31st Dec 2017.
https://www.kaggle.com/c/15-071x-the-analytics-edge-competition-spring-2015#description

Dataset can be downloaded from this link: https://tinyurl.com/dataset-NYT

message:
The Written test round for KDAG members selection will be held today. The shortlisted candidates have been sent an e-mail. Wish you all the best :)

Date:    2nd November, 2017 (today)
Time:    7:45 PM
Venue:  Vikramshila (V3 and V4)

The Written test round for KDAG members selection will be held today. The shortlisted candidates have been sent an e-mail. Wish you all the best :)

Date:    2nd November, 2017 (today)
Time:    7:45 PM
Venue:  Vikramshila (V3 and V4)

KDAG is organizing a workshop in association with Two Roads Tech Solutions, which is also looking to hire KGPians for entry-level roles. This will also be a chance to interact with the industry experts and get an insight into Quantitative Finance. You will get to learn about how finance interacts with technology and how the industry of this umbrella is evolving.
Date: 06:30PM
Time: 03-11-2017
Veunu: V3, Vikramshila
story: Kharagpur Data Analytics Group added an event.

message:
KDAG is organizing a workshop in association with Two Roads Tech Solutions, which is also looking to hire KGPians for entry-level roles. This will also be a chance to interact with the industry experts and get an insight into Quantitative Finance. You will get to learn about the interaction of finance with technology and how the industry of this umbrella is evolving.
Interested students should fill up this form: https://goo.gl/forms/CSR387qpstqYxbLx1

06.30 PM | V3 | 3rd November
See you all there!

For any query, call/ ping:
Vyom Shrivastava, 8609266433
Raj Anand, 9933911030

Interested in Machine Learning and Data Analytics? 

Kharagpur Data Analytics Group(KDAG) is hiring UG 2nd, 3rd years & PG 1st years.

KDAG is a student driven research group solving industrial problem statements in machine learning.

Fill out the google form. Link is given below. 
http://tinyurl.com/KDAG17-18

Registrations open till 27th October, 2017(Friday).

Interested in Machine Learning and Data Analytics? 

Kharagpur Data Analytics Group(KDAG) is hiring UG 2nd, 3rd years & PG 1st years.

KDAG is a student driven research group solving industrial problem statements in machine learning.

Fill out the google form. Link is given below. 
http://tinyurl.com/KDAG17-18

Registrations open till 27th October, 2017(Friday).
Thanks for attending the Analyse This workshop. You can find the code sample at https://github.com/K-DAG/analyzeThis
Thanks for attending the Analyse This workshop. You can find the code sample at https://github.com/K-DAG/analyzeThis

If you are an aspiring data analyst, we invite you to join us tomorrow at SN Bose Auditorium from 6 - 7 p.m. We will solve the problem statement of Analyze This and help you with your first submission. We will guide you through the basics of data pre-processing, feature engineering, model deployment and testing. Bring your laptops with ipython notebook installed.

If you are an aspiring data analyst, we invite you to join us tomorrow at SN Bose Auditorium from 6 - 7 p.m. We will solve the problem statement of Analyze This and help you with your first submission. We will guide you through the basics of data pre-processing, feature engineering, model deployment and testing. Bring your laptops with ipython notebook installed.
If you like machine learning and free pizzas do come to V4, Vikramshilla. We are waiting for you !
If you like machine learning and free pizzas do come to V4, Vikramshilla. We are waiting for you !
